Package edu.cnm.deepdive.nnmhlserver.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.nnmhlserver.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/users") public class UserController extends Object
Exposes rest endpoints on performing operation on User instances.
